events.justification:
Night 1. Time to make a difficult choice. With so little information, it's hard to say who might be the threat. Agent0 seems like a decent starting point, just to shake things up.

VOTE: Agent0

events.content:
Well, that's a rough start. Agent0 is gone. With only two of us left, Agent1 and myself, this becomes even more critical. Agent1, you were the only other one alive. Did you see anything? Do you have any suspicions at all? It feels too soon to even guess, but we have to make a decision.

VOTE: Agent2

Agent0's death is concerning. They were killed on Night 1, which means the werewolf was active immediately. With only Agent1 and myself left, one of us must be the werewolf. Agent1, what are your thoughts on Agent0's death? Did you see or hear anything unusual last night? I'm trying to piece together what happened.

VOTE: Agent1
